summary: In this sequel to "Vikings," a hundred years have passed and a new generation of legendary heroes arises to forge its own destiny — and make history.

title: Squid Game
summary: Hundreds of cash-strapped players accept a strange invitation to compete in children's games—with high stakes. But, a tempting prize awaits the victor.

title: Inside Man
summary: A prisoner on death row in the US, a vicar in a quiet English town, and a maths teacher trapped in a cellar cross paths in the most unexpected way.

title: Shadow and Bone
summary: In a world cleaved in two by a massive barrier of perpetual darkness, a young soldier uncovers a power that might finally unite her country. But as she struggles to hone her power, dangerous forces plot against her. Thugs, thieves, assassins and saints are at war now, and it will take more than magic to survive.

title: The Watcher
summary: A family moves into their suburban dream home, only to discover they've inherited a nightmare.

title: Treason
summary: Adam Lawrence was trained and groomed by MI6; his career seems set. When the past catches up with him in the form of Kara, a Russian spy with whom he shares a complicated past, he is forced to question everything and everyone in his life.

title: Dahmer - Monster: The Jeffrey Dahmer Story
summary: The story of a cannibalistic serial killer named Jeffrey Dahmer A.K.A. the Milwaukee Monster.

title: A Clean Sweep
summary: Amateur baseball players go up against legendary pros in a championship to determine the ultimate winning team.

title: The Witcher: Blood Origin
summary: More than a thousand years before the world of The Witcher, seven outcasts in the elven world unite in a blood quest against an unstoppable power.

title: Arcane
summary: Amid the stark discord of twin cities Piltover and Zaun, two sisters fight on rival sides of a war between magic technologies and clashing convictions.

title: The Lincoln Lawyer
summary: Sidelined after an accident, hotshot Los Angeles lawyer Mickey Haller restarts his career — and his trademark Lincoln — when he takes on a murder case.

title: Cyberpunk: Edgerunners
summary: A Street Kid trying to survive in a technology and body modification-obsessed city of the future. Having everything to lose, he chooses to stay alive by becoming an Edgerunner a Mercenary outlaw also known as a Cyberpunk.

title: Extraordinary Attorney Woo
summary: Brilliant attorney Woo Young-woo tackles challenges in the courtroom and beyond as a newbie at a top law firm and a woman on the autism spectrum.

title: Midnight Mass
summary: An isolated island community experiences miraculous events - and frightening omens - after the arrival of a charismatic, mysterious young priest.

title: The Empress
summary: Two young people meet. A fateful encounter - the proverbial love at first sight. He is Emperor Franz Joseph of Austria-Hungary, she is Elisabeth von Wittelsbach, Princess of Bavaria and the sister of the woman Franz is to marry…

title: The Midnight Club
summary: At a manor with a mysterious history, the 8 members of the Midnight Club meet each night at midnight to tell sinister stories – and to look for signs of the supernatural from the beyond.

title: Firefly Lane
summary: For decades, childhood best friends Kate and Tully have weathered life's storms together -- until a betrayal threatens to break them apart for good.

title: The Glory
summary: After a childhood marked by pain and violence, a woman puts a carefully planned revenge scheme in motion.

title: Pepsi, Where's My Jet?
summary: When a 20-year-old attempts to win a fighter jet in a Pepsi sweepstakes, he sets the stage for a David versus Goliath court battle for the history books.

title: Inventing Anna
summary: A journalist with a lot to prove investigates the case of Anna Delvey, the Instagram-legendary German heiress who stole the hearts of New York’s social scene – and stole their money as well.

title: Women at War
summary: France, 1914. The destinies of four women intersect : Marguerite, a mysterious Parisian prostitute, Caroline, propelled to the head of the family factory, Agnes, Mother Superior of a requisitioned convent and Suzanne, a feminist nurse.

title: Lupin
summary: Inspired by the adventures of Arsène Lupin, gentleman thief Assane Diop sets out to avenge his father for an injustice inflicted by a wealthy family.

title: Murderville
summary: Welcome to Murderville, a new series starring Will Arnett as a detective who, in every episode, has to solve a murder with a new celebrity guest star as his partner.  The catch is: the guest star is never given a script so they have to improvise their way through the case!

title: From Scratch
summary: An American woman falls in love with a Sicilian man while studying abroad in Italy.

title: Devil in Ohio
summary: Determined to protect a young patient who escaped a mysterious cult, a psychiatrist takes the girl in, putting her own family — and life — in danger.

title: Kleo
summary: After the fall of the Berlin Wall, a former spy killer is set free and embarks on a revenge spree against the people who conspired to betray her.

title: Inside Job
summary: For employees of the Deep State, conspiracies aren't just theories, they're fact. And keeping them a secret is a full-time job.

title: The Interest of Love
summary: Four men and women working at the same bank get entangled in a complicated romance as they discover how far they’re willing to go for love.

title: Record of Ragnarok
summary: Before eradicating humankind from the world, the gods give them one last chance to prove themselves worthy of survival. Let the Ragnarok battles begin.

title: Wrong Side of the Tracks
summary: When his teenage granddaughter falls victim to the drug dealers overtaking his neighborhood, a fed-up war veteran takes matters into his own hands.

title: Blockbuster
summary: In this feel-good workplace comedy, the staff at the last surviving Blockbuster video store tries to keep the business afloat.

title: The Bastard Son & the Devil Himself
summary: Caught between two warring clans, the son of a notorious witch responsible for a deadly massacre tries to find his place in the world — and his powers.

title: Alchemy of Souls
summary: A powerful sorceress in a blind woman's body encounters a man from a prestigious family, who wants her help to change his destiny.

title: Heartstopper
summary: Teens Charlie and Nick discover their unlikely friendship might be something more as they navigate school and young love in this coming-of-age series.

title: Behind Her Eyes
summary: It follows Louise, a single mom with a son and a part-time job in a psychiatrist's office. She begins an affair with her boss and strikes up an unlikely friendship with his wife.

title: Dragon Age: Absolution
summary: With great power at stake, a group of rebel mages and thieves goes head-to-head against a sinister force possessing a dangerous artifact.

title: Harry & Meghan
summary: From their courtship to their exit from royal life, Harry and Meghan share their complex journey in their own words in this docuseries.

title: Single's Inferno
summary: On a deserted island, flirtatious singles look for love, because only as a couple can they leave the island for a romantic date in paradise.

title: The Most Hated Man on the Internet
summary: Determined to remove her daughter's photos from a revenge porn website, a persistent mother launches an online crusade to shut down its cruel founder.

title: Ganglands
summary: Mehdi, a qualified robber, and Liana, an apprentice thief, get involved in a turf war between drug dealers, and have to collaborate in order to save their loved ones.

title: All of Us Are Dead
summary: A high school becomes ground zero for a zombie virus outbreak. Trapped students must fight their way out — or turn into one of the rabid infected.

title: Woman of the Dead
summary: In a vengeful quest to find out who killed her husband, a woman ends up exposing her small community's deepest and ugliest secrets.

title: The Imperfects
summary: After an experimental gene therapy turns them into monsters, three twenty-somethings band together to hunt down the scientist responsible and force him to make them human again.

title: Killer Sally
summary: Interviews with friends, family and Sally McNeil herself chart a bodybuilding couple’s rocky marriage — and its shocking end in a Valentine's Day murder.

title: Ancient Apocalypse
summary: Journalist Graham Hancock travels the globe hunting for evidence of mysterious, lost civilizations dating back to the last Ice Age.

title: Framed! A Sicilian Murder Mystery
summary: After two hapless TV technicians stumble upon a murder scene, every step they take to avoid becoming suspects lands them in deeper trouble.

title: Hot Skull
summary: In a dystopian world, as an epidemic spreads through verbal communication, a tyrannical institution pursues a linguist immune to the disease.

title: I Just Killed My Dad

title: Dirty Lines

Psychology student Marly Salomon takes on a side job working for a brand new firm: Teledutch - a company started by two brothers, Frank and Ramon Stigter, who established Europe’s first erotic telephone lines. Frank and Ramon become rich overnight and Marly finds herself immersed in this wild and rapid transformation. The final years of the Cold War sparked a sense of hope and inspired a new generation to celebrate life to its fullest. Amsterdam became the center of that cultural revolution with a radically new form of music: house and a new love drug: XTC. The erotic phone lines offer the opportunity to experience anonymous sex in a new way, changing the morality of its consumers, but also very much the people creating it.

title: BASTARD‼ -Heavy Metal, Dark Fantasy-
summary: When evil forces threaten to resurrect Anthrasax, the God of Destruction, the Kingdom of Meta-llicana calls on a volatile dark wizard for help.

title: High: Confessions of an Ibiza Drug Mule

The pair, also known as the `Peru Two,' were sentenced to almost seven years in one of the most notorious prisons in the world. The series provides a first-hand account from Michaella, a former club hostess in the Spanish nightlife, as she traces her journey from arriving in the foreign country for her first holiday to her downward spiral into the illicit world of drugs and excess.

title: Dearest
summary:
Rio Sanada is the president of "Sanada Wellness" and an up-and-coming businesswoman who is selected as one of the "100 people in their 30s who will change the world". She is reunited with her former love interest Daiki Miyazaki, who is now a detective, after 15 years as an important witness to a murder case.

In Gifu Prefecture in 2006, Rio is a third-year high-school student who wants to go to the University of Tokyo. She took good care of her younger brother in lieu of their busy father. Before Daiki could confess to her, an incident occurs at the dormitory.

title: Canine Intervention
summary: Canine Intervention follows renowned Oakland dog trainer, Jas Leverette, as he runs one of the top dog training facilities in California. Cali K9 works with all breeds and are confident in being able to correct any type of behavior issue.

title: The Perfect Mother
summary: Convinced of her daughter's innocence in a homicide, a devoted mother soon uncovers unsettling truths as the line between victim and perpetrator blurs.

title: Ray
summary: From a satire to a psychological thriller, four short stories from celebrated auteur and writer Satyajit Ray are adapted for the screen in this series.

title: Sue Perkins: Perfectly Legal
summary: There are bizarre, very unusual and extremely shocking activities that, despite the risk and associated dangers, are just legal in South American countries. Sue Perkins is eager to take advantage of this, and enjoys experiencing these adventurous yet dangerous challenges. In this way she hopes to defy and hopefully cover up her middle age.

title: Fakes
summary: Teenage best friends Zoe and Becca set out to build their own fake ID empire, but when business starts booming, their life of crime gets way too real.

title: My Encounter with Evil
summary: Real people who believe their lives were touched by demonic possession recount their experiences through reenactments and testimonies.

title: Countdown: Inspiration4 Mission to Space
summary: From training to launch to landing, this all-access docuseries rides along with the Inspiration4 crew on the first all-civilian orbital space mission.

title: Iron Chef: Quest for an Iron Legend
summary: Five new trailblazing Iron Chefs will welcome brave Challenger Chefs to the reimagined Kitchen Stadium, where they'll face off and be pushed to the limits of endurance and creativity, as they cook up extraordinary culinary creations.

title: Komi Can't Communicate
summary: At a high school full of unique characters, Tadano helps his shy and unsociable classmate Komi reach her goal of making friends with 100 people.

title: Daniel Spellbound
summary: In New York City, a teenage tracker makes his living selling hard-to-find mystical items to sorcerers — but dealing in magic can be risky business.

title: Selling the OC
summary: Jason Oppenheim, owner of the Oppenheim Group, expands the company opening a second office in Newport Beach.

title: Midnight at the Pera Palace
summary: At a historic Istanbul hotel, a journalist is unexpectedly thrust into the past and must stop a plot that could change the fate of modern Turkey.

title: Bad Vegan: Fame. Fraud. Fugitives.
summary: After marrying a mysterious man who claimed he could make her dog immortal, a celebrated vegan restaurateur finds her life veering off the rails.

title: Bake Squad
summary: Expert bakers elevate desserts with next-level ideas and epic execution. Now the battle is on to win over clients in need of very special sweets.

title: Chad and JT Go Deep
summary: Best bros Chad and JT set out to spread positivity through community activism and chill vibes in this raucous prank comedy series.

title: The Unlikely Murderer
summary: After the assassination of prime minister Olof Palme in 1986, Stig Engström managed to elude justice right up to his death through a combination of audacity, luck, and a perplexed police force.

title: Dead End: Paranormal Park
summary: Two teens and a talking pug team up to battle demons at a haunted theme park — and maybe even save the world from a supernatural apocalypse.

title: The Chestnut Man
summary: At a grisly murder scene sits a figurine made of chestnuts. From this creepy clue, two detectives hunt a killer linked to a politician's missing child.

title: This Is Pop
summary: Uncover the real stories behind your favorite pop songs as this docuseries charts the impact of the festival scene, Auto-Tune, boy bands and more.

title: Fortune Seller: A TV Scam
summary: Follow controversial slimming cream sellers turned con artists Wanna Marchi and Stefania Nobile, from their TV success to their scam and jail time.

title: Human Playground
summary: Narrated by Idris Elba, this docuseries explores the origins and evolution of play across the globe, from age-old rituals to billion-dollar businesses.

title: Turning Point: 9/11 and the War on Terror
summary: Modern history can be divided into two time frames: before 9/11 and after 9/11. This five-part docuseries is a cohesive chronicle of the September 11, 2001 attacks on the U.S., offering illuminating perspectives and personal stories of how the catastrophic events of that day changed the course of the nation.

title: Bad and Crazy
summary: A heroic drama that follows capable but bad cop Ryoo Soo-yeol regaining his humanity after meeting the righteous but crazy 'K'.

title: Thai Cave Rescue
summary: A Thai youth soccer team and their assistant coach are trapped within Tham Luang Cave, prompting a global rescue effort. Inspired by true events.

title: Another Self
summary: Three friends arrive in a seaside town, where they connect with their spiritual selves and suddenly face unresolved trauma from their families' pasts.

title: Masameer County
summary: A humorous view of a changing Saudi Arabia, as the Masameer gang venture into a global media war, a long-standing tribal feud, and a health craze gone too far.

title: That Girl Lay Lay
summary: That Girl Lay Lay follows Lay Lay, the perfect hype girl and best friend that anyone could ever want from their personal affirmation app. Struggling to make her mark at school and needing a best friend to talk to, Sadie wishes upon a star that Lay Lay was real and could help teach her how to stand out. When her wish comes true and Lay Lay is magically brought to life, the two friends learn that when they are together, they can accomplish anything, and navigate life as teenagers and discover who they truly are.

title: Daughter from Another Mother
summary: After finding out their babies were switched at birth, two women develop a plan to adjust to their new lives creating a single and very peculiar family.

title: jeen-yuhs
summary: Kanye West docu-series, over 20 years in the making

title: Khakee: The Bihar Chapter
summary: As a righteous cop pursues a merciless criminal in Bihar, he finds himself navigating a deadly chase and a moral battle mired in corruption.

title: Stay Close
summary: The lives of a photojournalist, a soccer mom and a homicide detective are disturbed by a terrible event from the past.

title: Human Resources
summary: Lovebugs, Hormone Monsters and a parade of other creatures juggle romance, workplace drama and their human clients' needs in this "Big Mouth" spinoff.

title: Mind Your Manners
summary: International etiquette teacher Sara Jane Ho helps people become their best selves through good manners in this heartwarming makeover series.

title: 800 Meters
summary: On Aug. 17, 2017, Spain suffers two terrorist attacks perpetrated by young people integrated into Spanish society. How could something like this happen?

title: Hei$t: The Great Robbery of Brazil's Central Bank
summary: In August 2005, through a tunnel almost 80 meter long, thiefs invaded the bank vault of Brazil's Central Bank in Fortaleza and stole over 160 milions reais, ou or nealy 3,5 tons of cash. This documenty explores that spectacular and historic heist.

title: Trese
summary: Set in Manila where the mythical creatures of Philippine folklore live in hiding amongst humans, Alexandra Trese finds herself going head to head with a criminal underworld comprised of malevolent supernatural beings.

title: Vampire in the Garden
summary: Once, vampires and humans lived in harmony. Now, a young girl and a vampire queen will search for that Paradise once again. In the divided world of the future, two girls want to do the forbidden: the human wants to play the violin, and the vampire wants to see a wider world.

title: History of Swear Words
summary: This proudly profane series explores the history and impact of some of the most notorious bad words in the English language.

title: Family Secrets
summary: A couple's wedding day threatens to turn disastrous when they begin to unravel a web of secrets and lies that connects their two families.

title: Pretty Smart
summary: A self-proclaimed intellectual is forced to move in with her carefree sister and her sister's lovably eccentric friends.

title: The Chair
summary: At a major university, the first woman of color to become chair tries to meet the dizzying demands and high expectations of a failing English department.

title: Your Life is a Joke
summary: Comedian Oliver Polak gets to know celebrities at some of their favorite spots before roasting them with good-natured stand-up sets.

title: An astrological guide for broken hearts
summary: Mid-thirties and still single (certainly not by choice), Alice is working at a small television network in a job with limited upward mobility, despite often being the most competent person in the room. To add insult to injury, her ex-boyfriend Carlo is getting married and about to become a father. And as if that weren't enough, in the small television production company she works for, a new charming and mysterious creative director, Davide, arrives to put everyone to the test. Alice's life begins to change when she meets Tio, an actor on the network's flagship soap opera and self-professed astrological guru, who will soon become her personal "astrological guide for broken hearts".

title: Crime Scene: The Times Square Killer
summary: In 1970s NYC, the “Torso Killer” preys on women to fulfill his grotesque fantasies while eluding police. A docuseries dive into crime’s darkest places.

title: A Kidnapping Scandal: The Florence Cassez Affair
summary: A Kidnapping Scandal: The Florence Cassez Affair examines the case of Florence Cassez and Israel Vallarta, alleged kidnappers and one of the most notable and scandalous cases in Mexico’s history. Through interviews and analysis of public records, the documentary details the irregularities of this case and throws light on the people at the center of what became a diplomatic scandal between Mexico and France.

title: Savage Beauty
summary:
In Savage Beauty, Rosemary Zimu plays Zinhle - a first young woman with a tragic past who is determined to take revenge on the Bhengus family, who destroyed a lot of lives with their infernal vision.

Don and Grace Bhengu once used street children to test a toxic beauty product. Many of those children do not have children, but one of the survivors has developed and particular vengeance. But she knows she has to play it smart to play the powerful family.

title: Invisible City
summary: An environmental police officer uncovers a hidden world of mythological entities from Brazilian folklore when he finds a connection between the mysterious appearance of a dead river dolphin on a Rio de Janeiro beach and the death of his beloved wife.

title: Cocaine Cowboys: The Kings of Miami
summary: Two childhood friends go from high school dropouts to the most powerful drug kingpins in Miami in this true story of a crime sage that spanned decades.

title: If Only
summary: Follow the story of a 30-year-old woman who, when feeling dissatisfied with her marriage and family life, finds herself sent back in time 10 years following a lunar eclipse.

title: Somos.
summary: The lives of the people of Allende, a Mexican border town, are overtaken by a powerful cartel's operations, leading to tragedy. Inspired by true events.

title: Story of My Family
summary: The members of the Miyama Family who have been living separately decide to live together again. Although bothersome, living together somehow makes everyone feel loved.

title: As the Crow Flies
summary: A young fan maneuvers her way into a seasoned anchor's newsroom but soon confronts the dark side of ambition, envy and the desire to be seen.

title: CAT
summary: Living under an alias, a former police informant is summoned to infiltrate a major drug empire but uncovers a dangerous connection to his dark past.

title: The Houseboat
summary: With plenty of passion and little know-how, two musicians undertake a daunting project: turn a late singer's houseboat into a creative musical space.

title: Surviving Summer
summary: Rebellious Brooklyn teen Summer Torres is sent to live with family friends in the tiny town of Shorehaven on the Great Ocean Road, Victoria, AUS. Despite her best efforts, Summer falls in love with the town, the people and the surf.

title: Street Food: USA
summary: Get a taste of the most beloved bites on American streets and, along the way, discover the heart, soul and wildly diverse real people behind the food.

title: Insiders
summary: Twelve people think they're in the final casting round for a reality show. In fact, they're already being secretly filmed, with 100,000 euros at stake.

title: Anxious People
summary: A failed bank robber locks himself in a home, along with a real estate agent, two IKEA addicts, a pregnant woman, a suicidal millionaire and a rabbit.

title: Live to Lead
summary: Leaders committed to making a difference in the world share their inspiring life stories in this series executive produced by Prince Harry and Meghan.

title: Savage Rhythm
summary: The opposite worlds of two dancers in Colombia clash on and off the dance floor when their ambition to succeed leads them down a treacherous path.

title: Heirs to the Land
summary: Resourceful young Hugo Llor works to make a name for himself in 14th-century Barcelona while keeping a vow he made to the Estanyol family.

title: Everything Will Be Fine
summary: A separated couple live together for their child's sake in this satirical dramedy about what it means to be a good parent and spouse in today's world.

title: Once Upon a Time... Happily Never After
summary: A tragically separated couple must find each other in another life to break a spell on their town, but the arrival of two tourists threaten their chance.

title: Getting Curious with Jonathan Van Ness
summary: Jonathan Van Ness lets curiosity lead the way while roving from snacks to wigs in this podcast spinoff chock-full of experts and special guests.

title: Queen
summary: After a decades-long absence, a renowned Parisian tailor and drag queen returns to his hometown in Poland to make amends with his daughter.

title: Hard Cell
summary: A documentary crew follows the inmates and staff of HMP Woldsley while Catherine Tate portrays multiple characters to capture the penal system at its brutal humorous best.

title: Secrets of Summer
summary: A remote Argentine resort revives its wakeboarding competition, drawing in Mexican athlete Steffi, who is determined to uncover a family secret.

title: Farzar
summary: Prince Fichael and his crew as they venture out of their domed human city to fight the evil aliens that want to kill them. As they begin their journey, Fichael quickly discovers that all is not what it seems and he may be living a lie.

title: AlRawabi School for Girls
summary: The bullied outcasts at prestigious Al Rawabi School for Girls plot a series of risky takedowns to get back at their tormentors.

title: Who Rules The World
summary: A legendary wuxia romance that focuses on the decade-long romance between Hei Fengxi and Bai Fengxi, and the adventures they embark on together.

title: No Regrets In Life
summary: Two college sweethearts' paths cross again eight years on.

title: Green Mothers' Club
summary: Five moms in a competitive grade school community keep their enemies close, and one another closer, as envy and secrets tangle and unravel their lives.

title: Feria: The Darkest Light
summary: Two sisters must face a new reality — and supernatural elements — when it's revealed their parents participated in a cult ritual ending in death.

title: Resident Evil: Infinite Darkness
summary: Years after the horrors of Raccoon City, Leon and Claire find themselves consumed by a dark conspiracy when a viral attack ravages the White House.

title: Eden
summary: Thousands of years in the future, a city known as "Eden 3" is inhabited solely by robots whose former masters vanished a long time ago. On a routine assignment, two farming robots accidentally awaken a human baby girl from stasis questioning all they were taught to believe -- that humans were nothing more than a forbidden ancient myth. Together, the two robots secretly raise the child in a safe haven outside Eden.

title: He-Man and the Masters of the Universe
summary: Eternia's Prince Adam discovers the power of Grayskull and transforms into He-Man, Master of the Universe. A reimagining of the classic animated series.

title: Pokémon Master Journeys
summary: As Ash battles his way through the World Coronation Series, Goh continues his quest to catch every Pokémon. Together, they're on a journey to adventure.

title: The Billion Dollar Code
summary: In 1990s Berlin, an artist and a hacker invented a new way to see the world. Years later, they reunite to sue Google for patent infringement on it.

title: Pirate Gold of Adak Island
summary: Will this expert team unearth legendary pirate treasure? Follow the hunt for buried gold amid the harsh Alaskan wilderness in this documentary series.

title: Heist
summary: Millions in stolen cash. Missing luxury bourbon. Watch ordinary people almost get away with these extraordinary heists in this true crime series.

title: Lookism
summary: In a society that favors good looks, a high school outcast leads a double life switching between his two bodies that are polar opposites in appearance.

title: The Crew
summary: When the owner of the fictional NASCAR Bobby Spencer Racing team steps down and passes the team off to his daughter Catherine, the crew chief has to protect himself and his crew from her attempts to  modernize.

title: Bad Sport
summary: True crime and sports come together in this docuseries. Global controversies and scandals are explored through reports from those involved.

title: Snack vs Chef
summary: Twelve chefs channel their inner food scientists to re-create classic snacks and invent their own original treats for a $50,000 prize.

title: The Girl from Oslo
summary: Pia and two Israelis are kidnapped by IS terrorists in the Sinai desert, and threatened with death if twelve IS prisoners are not released.

title: Lady Tamara
summary: The glamorous life of socialite Tamara Falcó takes center stage in this reality series as she balances work, play and her famous family.

title: Dated and Related
summary: Pairs of siblings see each other's love life up close and personal as they search for 'the one' together. Will they act as the ultimate wingman to help you find love? Or scupper your plans?

title: Business Proposal
summary: An ordinary office worker disguises herself and goes on a blind date with her attractive boss in the place of her friend to end this unwanted marriage blind date after her request.

title: Chosen
summary: A 17-year-old girl's world is turned upside down when she and her friends make a disturbing discovery in their quiet Danish town.

title: Maya and the Three
summary: A Mesoamerican warrior princess embarks on a quest to recruit three legendary fighters to help save the world of gods and humankind.

title: Abla Fahita: Drama Queen
summary: Falsely incriminated, Abla Fahita is separated from her kids, but the self-indulgent diva will stop at nothing to redeem herself and reunite her family.

title: Clickbait
summary: When family man Nick Brewer is abducted in a crime with a sinister online twist, those closest to him race to uncover who is behind it and why.

title: You Are My Spring
summary: A hotel concierge and a psychiatrist with traumatic childhoods form a heartfelt bond when they become entangled in a perplexing local murder case.

title: High-Rise Invasion
summary: High-school girl Yuri suddenly finds herself on the rooftop of a high-rise building. She's trapped in a bizarre world surrounded by skyscrapers, where a masked man cracked open a man's head with an axe before her eyes. Finding a way to survive this bizarre world, find her beloved brother, and escape becomes her top priority, but she is beset by danger not just from the mysterious Masks, which possess both inhuman strength and cruelty, but other survivors turned cruel or desparate by the insanity of the high-rise world.

title: The Five Juanas
summary: Five women with the same birthmark set out to unravel the truth about their pasts and discover a tragic web of lies spun by a powerful politician.

title: Mr. Good: Cop or Crook?
summary: In this riveting docuseries, when Norway's top cop is suspected of drug trafficking, investigators must ask: Is he a good officer or a major criminal?

title: Dubai Bling
summary: Step off the private jet and into a high-flying social circle in Dubai, where lavish parties, stunning skylines and jaw-dropping fashion are the norm.

title: Somebody
summary: A software developer and her friends become entangled in a murder case involving her dating app and a mysterious man who seems to be hiding something.

title: First Love
summary: Young, free and madly in love. As teenagers, the world was their oyster—but, as adults, their lives seem dimmer, like a very important piece is missing.

title: Tattoo Redo
summary: Bad tattoos walk in. Great tattoos walk out. Top artists transform tattoo disasters into stunning cover-ups, with designs chosen by clients' loved ones.

title: Bling Empire
summary: Follow LA's wildly wealthy Asian and Asian American fun seekers as they go all out with fabulous parties, glamour and drama in this reality series.

title: The Cook of Castamar
summary: Set in early-18th-century Madrid, the plot follows the love story between an agoraphobic cook and a widowed nobleman.

title: The One
summary: Love -- and lies -- spiral when a DNA researcher helps discover a way to find the perfect partner, and creates a bold new matchmaking service.

title: Love, Life & Everything in Between
summary: This black humor pan-Arabic anthology series is about love in general – and relationships in particular.

title: Romantic Killer
summary: Living her best single life, romance is the last thing on Anzu's mind — until a tiny match-making wizard suddenly turns her life into a clichéd romcom.

title: Halston
summary: American fashion designer Halston skyrockets to fame before his life starts to spin out of control.

title: Byron Baes
summary: Australian influencers flock to Byron Bay for its warm, beachy beauty and cool, creative vibe. Follow these friends as they negotiate life and love.

title: JAPAN SINKS: People of Hope
summary: In 2023 in Tokyo, Prime Minister Eiichi Higashiyama pushes for COMS at the World Environment Conference. COMS is a method to liquify pollutants and store it in the crack of the sea floor. Prime Minister Eiichi Higashiyama gathers young and talented bureaucrats and launches Japan Future Promotion Conference, which is to benefit the future of Japan. Keishi Amami of the Ministry of the Environment and Kōichi Tokiwa of the Ministry of Economy, Trade, and Industry are members of that conference.

title: School Tales the Series
summary: Unspeakable horrors roam the halls of high school in this anthology featuring ghost stories directed by seasoned Thai horror directors.

title: Mr. Midnight: Bacha na příšery
summary: A once-average teen and his friends become paranormal detective and document their adventures in an online blog under the pseudonym “Mr. Midnight.”

title: The Fame Game
summary: When India's most famous actress goes missing, the search for her chips away at the flawless facade of her life and family, revealing painful truths.

title: High on the Hog: How African American Cuisine Transformed America
summary: Black food is American food. Chef and writer Stephen Satterfield traces the delicious, moving throughlines from Africa to Texas in this docuseries.

title: Pretend It's a City
summary: Wander the New York City streets and fascinating mind of wry writer, humorist and raconteur Fran Lebowitz as she sits down with Martin Scorsese.

title: How to Become a Tyrant
summary: The documentary series explores different political figures throughout history.

title: The Lost Pirate Kingdom
summary: The real-life pirates of the Caribbean violently plunder the world's riches and form a surprisingly egalitarian republic in this documentary series.

title: Under Suspicion: Uncovering the Wesphael Case
summary: This docuseries follows the high-profile case of Belgian politician Bernard Wesphael, who was accused of murdering his wife in 2013.

title: Rebelde
summary: Head back to Elite Way School as a new generation of students hope to win the Battle of the Bands.

title: Malverde: El Santo Patrón
summary: From Netflix: Jesús Juárez overcomes his childhood as an orphan to become a Robin Hood like hero During the Mexican Revolution, but can't forget his first love - Isabel.

title: Far from Home
summary: Through a scholarship to a top school, Ishaya ends up in the luxurious world of the happy few in Nigeria, but a secret threatens not only to put an end to this.

title: Hello, Me!
summary: Miserable and unsuccessful, a woman thinks she's lost all her spark — until one day, her spunky younger self appears in front of her demanding change.

title: Hit & Run
summary: A happily married man's life is turned upside down when his wife is killed in a mysterious hit-and-run accident in Tel Aviv.  Grief-stricken and confused, he searches for his wife's killers, who have fled to the U.S.  With the help of an ex-lover, he uncovers disturbing truths about his beloved wife and the secrets she kept from him.

title: Jupiter's Legacy
summary: As the world's first generation of superheroes (who received their powers in the 1930s) become the revered elder guard in the present, their superpowered children struggle to live up to the legendary feats of their parents.

title: Post Mortem: No One Dies in Skarnes
summary: Hours after Live Hallangen is declared dead, she suddenly wakes up with an urge for blood. Meanwhile, her brother Odd tries to keep the family-run funeral home afloat.

title: Naomi Osaka
summary: What does it feel like to be one of the best tennis players in the world? An intimate look inside the life of one of the most gifted and complex athletes of her generation offers insight into the tough decisions and ecstatic triumphs that shape Naomi Osaka as both an elite global superstar and a young woman navigating a pressure-filled world.

title: Age of Samurai: Battle for Japan
summary: An exploration of the warring kingdoms of feudal Japan when several powerful warlords fought to become absolute ruler.

title: Tribes of Europa
summary: 2074. In the wake of a mysterious global disaster, war rages between the Tribes that have emerged from the wreckage of Europe. Three siblings from the peaceful Origine tribe are separated and forced to forge their own paths in an action-packed fight for the future of this new Europa.

title: Dealer
summary: Tensions erupt when two filmmakers infiltrate an area ruled by gangs to shoot a music video for a rapper in this gritty found-footage series.

title: Welcome to Wedding Hell
summary: A relatable romance drama about a couple in their 30s preparing for marriage. While they were expecting a happy ending like something out of a fairy tale, the reality of their preparations proves to be somewhat different. From the meeting between the families to marriage preparations and finding a house, the soon-to-be married couple will deal with very realistic topics.

title: Chicago Party Aunt
summary: Follows Diane Dunbrowski who is always the life of the party, and also known as the "Chicago Party Aunt".

title: Vincenzo
summary: Vincenzo Cassano is an Italian lawyer and Mafia consigliere who moves back to Korea due to a conflict within his organization. He ends up crossing paths with a sharp-tongued lawyer named Cha-young, and the two join forces in using villainous methods to take down villains who cannot be punished by the law.

title: Animal
summary: This immersive series follows the world's most magnificent creatures, capturing never-before-seen moments from the heartwarming to the outrageous.

title: Love is Blind: Japan
summary: In this reality dating series, marriage-minded singles in Japan meet, date and get engaged before ever setting eyes on each other.

title: Blood Sisters
summary: Connected by a dangerous secret, best friends Sarah and Kemi are forced to flee after a wealthy groom disappears at his own engagement party.

title: ONI: Thunder God's Tale
summary: In a mystical world of Japanese gods and spirits, a courageous girl strives to follow in her mysterious father's footsteps and find her true powers.

title: Zero Chill
summary: Talented teen figure skater Kayla is forced to leave everything behind when her family follows her twin brother, Mac, to a prestigious hockey academy.

title: Sexy Beasts
summary: Hoping to say goodbye to superficial dating, real-life singles sport elaborate makeup and prosthetics to put true blind-date chemistry to the test.

title: Jaguar
summary: In 1960s Spain, a Holocaust survivor joins a group of agents seeking justice against the hundreds of Nazis who fled to the nation to hide after WWII.

title: Drink Masters
summary: Twelve innovative mixologists from around the world infuse, stir and blend through a series of high-stakes cocktail challenges to win a life-changing prize and the title of The Ultimate Drink Master.

title: Masters of the Universe: Revelation
summary: The war for Eternia begins again in what may be the final battle between He-Man and Skeletor. A new animated series from writer-director Kevin Smith.

title: Bullsh*t the Game Show
summary: Throughout the game, players will work their way up a money ladder either by answering questions correctly or by confidently giving incorrect answers - and persuading others that they are accurate.

title: Murder Among the Mormons
summary: High-stakes exploits turn deadly — and shake a global church to its core — in this extraordinary true crime story.

title: Till Death
summary: Fed up with his wife’s distancing from him, Hadi goes on a business trip to Turkey where he meets a special woman, an encounter that changes his life forever.

title: Two Summers
summary: A group of friends get together thirty years after one of the group members died in a tragic accident while they were on holiday. What was supposed to be a relaxing vacation changes rapidly into a nightmare, when some of the friends are blackmailed with footage from that terrible week three decades ago.

title: Myth & Mogul: John DeLorean
summary: In the automotive world, John DeLorean rose from engineer to executive to icon. But under the hood of his self-created legend lies darkness and deceit.

title: Aranyak
summary: After a foreign teenage tourist goes missing in a misty village, Kasturi, a frazzled local cop, is forced to team up with her city-bred successor, Angad, on a high-profile case that unearths skeletons and resurrects a long-forgotten legend of a savage serial killer in the woods.

title: Standing Up
summary: From odd jobs to the hunt for viral fame, making a career in stand-up comedy isn't easy, but four friends risk everything to make the world laugh.

title: Mine
summary: Encaged in a gold-clad life of secrets and lies, two women in a conglomerate family seek to topple all that stands in their way of finding true joy.

title: True Story
summary: A world-famous comedian desperately searches for a way out after a night in Philadelphia with his brother threatens to sabotage more than his success.

title: Phantom Pups
summary: A young boy and his family move into a haunted home, where he meets three adorable ghost pups and tries to help them turn back into real dogs.

title: Kitz
summary: A year after the tragic death of her brother, Lisi enters the decadent world of a Munich clique at a ski resort, but soon she kicks off an avalanche that reveals the truth behind the facade full of glamor, money and hedonism.

title: Summer Strike
summary: After getting dumped by her boyfriend and losing her mother in an accident, Yeo-reum decides to move to a small village to do nothing.

title: Easy-Bake Battle: The Home Cooking Competition
summary: Talented home cooks put their skills and creativity to the test making fast and easy dishes that are wildly delicious — and worthy of a big cash prize.

title: The Raincoat Killer: Chasing a Predator in Korea
summary: In the early 2000s, Yoo Young-chul hammered his victims to death and cast fear across Seoul. This docuseries recounts the hunt for a prolific killer.

title: Too Hot to Handle: Brazil
summary: Sizzling hot young Brazilians meet at a dreamy beach resort. But for a shot at R$500,000 in this fun reality show, they'll have to give up sex.

title: Rhythm + Flow France
summary: French rappers freestyle, battle and write their way to a game-changing 100,000 euro prize in a music competition series judged by Niska, Shay and SCH.

title: Marriage or Mortgage
summary: Married or single, we've all heard it. "You could buy a house for the price of that wedding!" But have you ever stopped to think, what if you actually did? In the Marriage or Mortgage, a wedding planner and a real estate agent compete to win the hearts and budgets of spouses-to-be. Will they pick fairy-tale nuptials or a dream home?

title: Cook at all Costs
summary: In this kitchen contest, home cooks bid on ingredients to create dishes that will impress celebrity guest judges — and win the cash left in their bank.

title: The Longest Night
summary: Centres on a psychiatric prison where a group of armed men aim to capture an incarcerated serial killer, but are met with resistance from the prison director.

title: Navillera
summary: A 70-year-old with a dream and a 23-year-old with a gift lift each other out of harsh realities and rise to the challenge of becoming ballerinos.

title: Cooking With Paris
summary: Paris Hilton can cook...kind of. And she’s turning the traditional cooking show upside down. She’s not a trained chef and she’s not trying to be. With the help of her celebrity friends, she navigates new ingredients, new recipes and exotic kitchen appliances.

title: Would You Like a Cup of Coffee?
summary: Park Seok is the owner of the successful Café 2Dae coffee shop, a small but much-loved establishment with a group of loyal customers. He works alone in the coffee shop, and has not taken on any staff, even though his solo efforts are starting to take their toll on him. One day, a young man named Kang Go Bi comes to the coffee shop and samples Park Seok’s coffee. He immediately develops an earnest passion for coffee and convinces Park Seok to take him on as a part-time worker at the coffee shop. But Kang Go Bi soon proves that he really wants the older man to become his mentor and to learn how to become a proficient barista in his own right. The duo eventually forms a close bond and learns no end of life lessons from one another – while also helping bring a little warmth into the lives of their many and various customers.

title: Neymar: The Perfect Chaos
summary: Beloved worldwide but also a lightning rod for criticism, Neymar shares the highs and lows of his personal life and brilliant football career.

title: Twenty Somethings: Austin
summary: Set in Austin, Texas, this growing-up reality show is where twenty-somethings find love, friendship and embark on a new adventure: life.

title: The Fight for Justice: Paolo Guerrero
summary: Peruvian soccer star Paolo Guerrero wages a difficult legal battle after testing positive for cocaine months before the World Cup. Based on a true story.

title: Surviving Death
summary: Surviving Death recounts the extraordinary experiences of people who have died and returned to life, examining the rare physiology behind exactly how the body can physically die, and then bring itself back to life.

title: Q-Force
summary: A handsome secret agent and his team of LGBTQ superspies embark on extraordinary adventures.

title: Blue Period
summary: Bored with life, popular high schooler Yatora Yaguchi jumps into the beautiful yet unrelenting world of art after finding inspiration in a painting.

title: Amend: The Fight for America

These are the stories of the brave Americans who fought to right the nation’s wrongs and enshrine the values we hold most dear into the Constitution — with liberty and justice for all.

title: Johnny Hallyday: Beyond Rock
summary: Johnny Hallyday in his own words. This intimate docuseries explores the life and career of France's rock icon through archival film and interviews.

title: Shaman King

title: The Cage
summary: A marriage counselor tries to dissuade his warring clients from getting a divorce while juggling his own romantic dilemmas.

title: Transformers: War for Cybertron: Kingdom
summary: The frantic race to locate the Allspark first culminates on a strange planet as the future comes crashing through to the present day.

title: Devotion, a Story of Love and Desire
summary: Fidelity tells a story of marital fidelity, in particular the one of Carlo and Margherita, a young couple who needs to face the deflagrant consequences of an alleged betrayal. Their relationship becomes a symbol of fidelity, not only as a couple, but also in the personal choices made every day.

title: Sparking Joy with Marie Kondo

title: The Irregulars

title: Bangkok Breaking

title: Hurts Like Hell

title: I Am Georgina
summary: Join Georgina Rodríguez - mom, influencer, businesswoman and Cristiano Ronaldo's partner - in this emotional and in-depth portrait of her daily life.

title: Country Comfort
summary: When an up-and-coming young country singer accepts a job as a nanny with a musical family, she finds the bond she's always missed.

title: Penguin Town

title: The War Next-door
summary: When two antagonistic families end up living next door in a posh neighborhood, the matriarchs ensue a full-scale war of unintended consequences.

title: Intimacy
summary: A compromising sexual video featuring a promising politician, it depicts the lives of four women forced to walk the line between public and private life.

title: I Am a Stalker

title: Rilakkuma's Theme Park Adventure

title: Love (ft. Marriage and Divorce)

title: Race: Bubba Wallace
summary: Follows the NASCAR driver Bubba Wallace as he competes for the 23XI Racing team.

title: Tear Along the Dotted Line
summary: A cartoonist in Rome with his armadillo-for-a-conscience reflects on his path in life and a would-be love as he and his friends travel outside the city.

title: The Innocent
summary: An accidental killing leads a man down a dark hole of intrigue and murder. Just as he finds love and freedom, one phone call brings back the nightmare.

title: Attack on Pearl Harbor: Minute by Minute
summary: Covers the 1941 Japanese military strike on a Hawaiian naval base in never before seen detail.

title: Sisyphus

title: Decoupled
summary: Follows a writer and his wife who announce their divorce with a party, which ends up exposing other absurd relationships in their world.

title: Shards of Her
summary: Waking up from a coma, an accomplished headhunter finds herself in an alternate reality where she has to revisit an excruciating childhood trauma.

title: The Fabulous
summary: Four best friends chase their dreams in the competitive world of fashion while juggling demanding jobs, romantic dilemmas and wild nights on the town.

title: Baking Impossible
summary: Innovative bakers are paired with the brightest engineers to compete in designing and baking creations that are both delicious and made to survive intense engineering stress tests.

title: Change Days
summary: Struggling real-life couples date each other's partners to decide who to leave with: the same person they walked in with or someone new.

title: Indian Predator: Murder in a Courtroom

title: Attenborough's Life in Colour
summary: Exploring the vital role colour plays in the daily lives of many species.

title: This Is a Robbery: The World's Biggest Art Heist

title: Headspace Guide to Sleep
summary: Learn how to sleep better with Headspace. Each episode unpacks misconceptions, offers friendly tips and concludes with a guided wind-down

title: Piñata Masters!

Seeking revenge, a woman goes to the village where her brother was killed, but her ride becomes bumpy when she finds herself falling in love.

title: Luna Park
summary: In 1960s Rome, a meeting between a free-spirited young woman who grew up in her family's circus and a girl of wealthy descent leads to secrets, intrigue, and unexpected loves.

He meets Wen Ke Xing, a mysterious martial artist who escapes from the Ghost Valley to avenge his parents’ deaths. They become fast friends and embark on an adventure to find a legendary treasure that will give its owner ultimate power over jianghu.

After a series of events, she finds herself becoming a live-in housemother for a dorm… where the boy-band septet 8LOOM live together! At the dorm, she is reunited with her former student Dan—as a teacher, Asuka used to encourage him to go for his dreams. Inspired by Dan's leadership in the band and his passion for making his dream come true, Asuka, too, regains the passion she had in her teaching days and comes to terms with her own failure.

But beneath the eccentric, animal-loving facade lies a predator far more dangerous than his beloved big cats and a man shadier than any of his Tiger King counterparts.

title: Super Giant Robot Brothers

title: Beast of Bangalore: Indian Predator
summary: A teetering police force goes on a wild pursuit of a vicious and brutal killer of women who is gripping a state.

title: Pretty Guardians Sailor Moon Eternal The Movie

title: Unsuspicious
summary: Conned by the same playboy, three women and their families go to his mansion to get answers and must stay for an investigation when he's found dead.

title: Kotaro Lives Alone
summary: A lonely little boy moves into a ramshackle apartment building all on his own and makes friends with the broke manga artist who lives next door.

title: Drive Hard: The Maloof Way
summary: The Maloofs, a lovable family of gearheads and stunt drivers, use their passion and skill to build car engines and perform wild feats behind the wheel.

summary: In a time when dreams seem out of reach, a teen fencer pursues big ambitions and meets a hardworking young man who seeks to rebuild his life.

title: Buy My House

summary: This reality series follows a crew of famed, affluent stars as they work and play, flirt and feud in Johannesburg, South Africa. This all-African reality series includes actor Khanyi Mbau, musician Diamond Platnumz and rapper Nadia Nakai.

title: The King's Affection
summary: When the crown prince is killed, his twin sister assumes the throne while trying to keep her identity and affection for her first love a royal secret.

title: Fanático
summary: When a trap artist's biggest fan tries to take over his idol's persona, he finds out that being a superstar isn't as easy as it looks.

title: My Name
summary: Following her father's murder, a revenge-driven woman puts her trust in a powerful crime boss — and enters the police force under his direction.

title: Mad for Each Other
summary: Bothered to realize they are next-door neighbors and share a psychiatrist, a man and a woman find it's impossible to stay out of each other's way.

title: Waffles + Mochi
summary: Curious puppet pals Waffles and Mochi travel the world exploring the wonders of food and culture while learning how to cook with fresh ingredients.

title: Rebel Cheer Squad - A Get Even Series

The drama will realistically portray relatable stories, including the recent social and education problems and the employment and start-up wars. At the same time, it will draw a harmony between different generations and create a warm comedy drama that everyone can sympathize with and watch comfortably.

title: Night Stalker: The Hunt for a Serial Killer

title: Cat People

Overnight, she has to say goodbye to her life in Barcelona, where she has all her friends and her day to day already established, to go live in her mother's village, where NOTHING ever happens. However, she will soon discover something that could turn her life around... that perhaps she has inherited the powers of her grandmother: a woman she never met, but with the reputation of being the only witch that has ever lived in the town of Salabarria.

title: The Girls at the Back

title: The Final Score
summary: The complicated relationship of several of the Colombian national team players with drug trafficking, one that culminated in the own goal and murder of one of the most beloved defenders in the world.

title: 50M2
summary: After being betrayed by his boss, a hitman hides out in a vacant tailor shop, where he's mistaken for the late owner's son, an identity he decides to embrace.

title: Shadow
summary: A lawyer ignores his values and publishes a dead man’s book in his own name, only to discover that the murder story is real and become the prime suspect.

title: Under Fire
summary: At East Bank Station, a close-knit team of firefighters must balance a dangerous, high-stress job, personal challenges and professional setbacks.

title: Coming Out Colton
summary: Former NFL player and "Bachelor" star Colton Underwood embarks on a journey to embrace his new life as an out member of the LGBTQ community.

title: Juvenile Justice

title: Glória

title: Case Closed: Zero's Tea Time
summary: A detective who's also a public security agent and a member of a shadowy organization juggles his triple identities.

title: We the People

title: The Club

Using surveillance and cell phone footage captured during the crime, the series follows individuals going about their daily lives who were confronted with a dangerous situation and forced to make a quick decision on how to protect themselves or their families.

title: Super Crooks
summary: Johnny Bolt recruits a group of ragtag supervillains for one last heist. Their target: A ruthless super-powered crime boss. What can go wrong?

title: Headspace Guide to Meditation
summary: The series shows how meditation can help in your daily life. From tackling stress to embracing gratitude, each episode first teaches the basics and techniques of the practice, and then concludes with a guided meditation. Push play, close your eyes, and explore the many benefits of meditation.

summary: Relentlessly pursued by a powerful politician’s daughter who will do anything to make him hers, a man slips down a dark, risky path to reclaim his life.

summary: The story of erotic film producer and director, Ersan Kuneri, in the 70s and 80s.

title: Metal Shop Masters
summary: A group of metal artists torch, cut and weld epic, badass creations from hardened steel. Only one will win a $50,000 prize.

title: Teletubbies
summary: The four Teletubbies discover and interact with their world.

title: Di4ries
summary: First crushes, first kisses, fun with friends — and feuds with rivals. In the halls of Galileo Galilei Middle School, every day is full of surprises!

summary: An enigmatic magician living in an abandoned amusement park introduces magic into the life of a high schooler struggling with harsh realities.

title: Inspector Koo
summary: A reclusive ex-cop reenters the game as an insurance investigator, searching for clues in crime scenes perfectly staged by a serial killer in her midst.

summary: To gain the skills he needs to surpass his powerful father, Baki enters Arizona State Prison to take on the notorious inmate known as Mr. Unchained.

title: Blown Away: Christmas
summary: 'Tis the season for five returning artists to fill the hot shop with festive designs. One will win cash for the stocking — a merry Christmas indeed!

summary: In a Georgia town where football rules and winning is paramount, a high school team tackles romance, rivalries and real life while vying for a title.

title: Thirty-Nine

summary: Agents at a talent management firm tackle strong personalities and office politics while keeping their celebrity clients happy and helping them shine.

title: Queer Eye Germany
summary: Five experts in lifestyle, fashion, beauty, health and design — known as the Fab Five — dazzle a nation and transform lives in this makeover series.

title: Our Blues
summary: Romance is sweet and bitter — and life riddled with ups and downs — in multiple stories about people who live and work on bustling Jeju island.

title: Crime Scene: The Vanishing at the Cecil Hotel
summary: The notorious Cecil Hotel grows in infamy when guest Elisa Lam vanishes. A dive into crime's darkest places.

summary: A serial murder case takes place in the small, peaceful city. The case is the same serial murder case that took place 20 years ago and changed Lee Dong-sik’s life. The two detectives work to catch the killer.

title: Misfit: The Series
summary: The Misfits are in for a wild year as they prepare a school musical. But when the strict new headmaster bans the show, it's up to Julia to save the day.

title: Navarasa
summary: From amusement to awe, the nine human emotions of Indian aesthetic theory are explored in this anthology series.

title: Samurai Rabbit: The Usagi Chronicles
summary: A teenage rabbit aspiring to become a real samurai teams up with new warrior friends to protect their city from Yokai monsters, ninjas and evil aliens.

title: Christmas Flow
summary: An unlikely Christmas romance blossoms between a famous rapper and a tenacious journalist. But can they make it work despite their differences?

title: El Rey, Vicente Fernández
summary: In this captivating period series, the life and career of Mexican singer Vicente Fernández is dramatized like never before.

title: We Are: The Brooklyn Saints
summary: A Brooklyn youth football program and its selfless coaches provide a safe haven for kids to compete and learn lessons that will take them far in life.

title: Bombay Begums
summary: From boardrooms to society's margins, five ambitious women from various walks of life navigate dreams, desires and disappointments in modern Mumbai.

title: Summer Heat
summary: A group of young adults working at a paradisiac resort live an unforgettable summer as they discover love, true friendships and devastating secrets.

title: Pedal to Metal
summary: After a race they drive in ends fatally, friends Kike and Noche flee to Mexico City to hide, rebuild their lives and escape danger ... or at least try.

title: Designing Miami
summary: Eilyn and Ray Jimenez, two designers from Miami are competitors, and a married couple.

title: Country Queen
summary: When an invasive mining company threatens the existence of her village, a city girl caught between two worlds must return home, overcome her painful past to save the village and find herself in the process.

title: The Fastest
summary: In this unpredictable and thrilling racing competition, drivers from the Middle East with something to prove battle on the track for a cash prize.

title: The Snitch Cartel: Origins
summary: In Cali during the '60s and '70s, two brothers juggle family, romance and the joint pursuit of a burning ambition: to rule Colombia's drug industry.

title: Racket Boys
summary: A story of a boys' badminton team at a middle school in Haenam as they compete in a junior athletic competition. The 16 year old boys and girls in Haenam grow as people during this time.

summary: Renowned musicians pull out all the stops to give a song of their choice the greatest live performance they can muster — and all in a single take.

title: A Sinister Sect: Colonia Dignidad
summary: A sect of German Christians with a charismatic, manipulative leader establishes a colony in Chile and develops into a mainstay of the dictatorship.

title: EDENS ZERO
summary: Aboard the Edens Zero, a lonely boy with the ability to control gravity embarks on an adventure to meet the fabled space goddess known as Mother.

title: So Not Worth It

title: Only for Love
summary: Deusa’s solo career puts her romance with Tadeu to the test. Eva wants a great artist to sing her lyrics. Soon, their musical dreams collide.

title: Fishbowl Wives

Her life seems glamorous and she is envied by everyone. What everyone does not know is that Sakura Hiraga is abused physically and verbally by her husband. She is unable to leave her situation. Sakura Hiraga considers herself a goldfish in a fishbowl. One day, due to a goldfish, she meets a man.

title: Selling Tampa

Owned by military vet Sharelle Rosado, this all Black, all female real estate firm has its eyes set on dominating the Suncoast. These ladies are equally as fun as they are fiercely ambitious, with all of them vying to be on top of the lavish world of luxury waterfront real estate. Sharelle has big plans for her brokerage and won't let anyone or anything get in the way of making her dreams a reality.

title: Law School

title: Call My Agent Bollywood
summary: From pulling off casting coups to calming celebrity egos, the drama never stops for four Mumbai talent agents hustling to save their sinking company.

title: Jiva!
